title: Shipt
description: A full stack web application made in a team with the use of ReactJS and ExpressJS. The application is a replica of the website 'Shipt', with new features presented by the UX team.

title: Welcome to The Clubs
description: A full stack web application made independently with the use of ReactJS and Ruby on Rails. This is a virtual book club where users may sign-up/ sign-in for full access to modify reading lists.

title: Rick And Morty Trivia
description: A Javascript application with the use of a third party API to create a fan page for Rick and Morty lovers. It displays characters and includes a trivia game in levels easy and hard.
